glsa.title: Mantis: Cross-Site Scripting
glsa.synopsis: A persistent Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability has been discovered in Mantis.

background.p: Mantis is a web-based bug tracking system.

description.p: seiji reported that the filename for the uploaded file in bug_report.php is not properly sanitised before being stored.

impact.p: A remote attacker could upload a file with a specially crafted to a bug report, resulting in the execution of arbitrary HTML and script code within the context of the users's browser. Note that this vulnerability is only exploitable by authenticated users.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Mantis users should upgrade to the latest version:
